data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jeff Hardeveld (Almelo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 30, Almelo have been given a penalty...
Goal! Rai Vloet gives Almelo a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Teun Bijleveld for Almelo has been booked by Jochem Kamphuis and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's third substitution at Erve Asito with Chukwunonso Madueke replacing Mauro Junior.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Michal Sadilek with Ryan Thomas. This is the second substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) is making a first substitution, with Donyell Malen replacing Mohammed Ihattaren.
Eindhoven have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 51, Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Almelo. Philipp Max converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
Silvester Van der Water is replacing Sinan Bakis for Almelo at Erve Asito.
Delano Burgzorg is replacing Adrian Szoke for the home team.
In the minute 73, Pablo Rosario (Eindhoven) has received a first yellow card.
Orestis Kiomourtzoglou (Almelo) gets a yellow card.
Bruma (Eindhoven) has received a yellow card from Jochem Kamphuis.
In the minute 79, Eindhoven make their fourth substitution with Olivier Boscagli replacing Cody Gakpo.
Frank Wormuth is making the team's third substitution at Erve Asito with Lucas Schoofs replacing Tim Breukers.
Robin Propper is booked for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
